title: Bad on Politics #3: WTF is Medicare for all? Margot Sanger-Katz gives us a healthcare primer
itunes:title: Bad on Politics #3: WTF is Medicare for all? Margot Sanger-Katz gives us a healthcare primer
description:
In this episode of Bad on Politics we dive into one of our most-requested topics… healthcare!

We’re joined by New York Times journalist, Margot Sanger-Katz, to break down the various healthcare structures on the table in this election and which candidates support which plan. We also spend some time discussing the implications of these plans and whether they’re feasible (or likely given our current congressional map). We’re certainly feeling way more healthcare-literate after this episode, and hope you do too!

 

For more Margot Sanger-Katz:

@sangerkatz on twitter

https://www.nytimes.com/by/margot-sanger-katz - for her articles

 

About Bad on Politics: Bad on Politics is a monthly bonus episode where we invite a guest expert to help us break down a political topic. We get it, politics is confusing and there's a anxiety-inducing amount of news coverage to follow. So, we're here to ask the "dumb" questions so you don't have to. We want to break things down so you can understand what's going on and make an informed opinion.
